title: Did Pelosi visit the closed hair salon because of COVID-19?
subtitle: This hair appointment gave rise to widespread controversy in the summer of 2020.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In August 2020, Nancy Belusi, President of the U.S. House of Representatives, had a hair appointment in a salon in San Francisco, at a time when the hair salons were prevented from working in the city because of COVID-19.
